creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard M. Sweet
description: black and white image of a man in a tuxedo and top hat; the sitter is seated on a chair covered in fabric; the sitter has both hands in pant pockets with thumbs sticking out
markings: Photo by Penn and Conde Nast stamps on mount verso; Penn negative number in ink on mount upper right verso
signed: on mount recto, brown ink: Irving Penn, New York, 1947
title: Ray Bolger
